// CartItem import {BsPlusSquare, BsDashSquare} from 'react-icons/bs' import {AiFillCloseCircle} from 'react-icons/ai' import CartContext from '../../context/CartContext' import './index.css' const CartItem = props => ( {value => { const {deleteCartItem} = value const {cartItemDetails} = props const {id, title, brand, quantity, price, imageUrl} = cartItemDetails const onDeleteCartItem = () => { deleteCartItem(id) } return (

  • {title}

    by {brand}

    {quantity}

    Rs {price * quantity}/-

    • ) }}     ) export default CartItem
